doc:
John Vivyan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Vivyan 0 John Vivyan (May 31, 1915 – December 20, 1983) was an American actor active primarily between 1957 and 1970. He was known for his starring role as the debonair gambler in the CBS adventure series Mr. Lucky. John_Vivyan ( May_31_,_1915 – December_20_,_1983 ) was an_American_actor_active primarily between 1957_and_1970 . He was_known for his_starring_role as the_debonair_gambler in the_CBS_adventure_series_Mr._Lucky .
